description:
A minimalist game where you control a Red Triangle in order to lead a revolution. Inspired by El Lissitzky's "Beat the Whites with the Red Wedge"

How-to Play:
Press and drag the red triangle with left mouse button. Collect and merge with white triangles. Avoid falling white circles at all cost. The objective is to become powerful enough to destroy the moving White Circle at the bottom

Press "R key" to reset the game.
